query.statement:
SELECT A.KUNNR_NM NAM ,A.ZSITE_NM SPT ,A.ADDR1 || ' ' || A.ADDR2 ADDR ,A.ADDR1 ,A.ADDR2 ,A.ZSITE_TEL TEL ,A.ZCITY CYGUBUN ,B.KUNNR ,B.REGIO AS LAND1 ,C.CTEXT2 AS LAND1_NM ,A.POSID AS PJT FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST003 AS B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.KUNNR = A.KUNNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS C ON C.MANDT = A.MANDT --AND C.LANG = #G_MANDT# AND C.LANG = #G_LANG# -- ¼öÁ¤ AND C.CODE1 = 'LAND1' AND C.CODE2 = B.REGIO
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.POSID = #PJT# WITH UR
